name: DELIVERY GUARANTEED
description:
Delivery Guaranteed is a physics based Pizza Delivery simulator where you cut as many corners to deliver pizza before time runs out, including throwing pizza boxes at houses! Skirt through a world of destructible objects making shortcuts to hungry customers houses. 

Your objective is to deliver a set amount of pizza before time runs out, follow the green arrow as it guides you to each house. Gain money completing levels to unlock cool new cars that provide a faster and more destructive experience.

  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Click - Shoot Pizza
  • WASD - Drive

BrokeGang Studio: Eazyyy (Ryan Matthews) & Pdfirefly (Ron Liew)

Programming by Ron & Ryan, Original music and Promo by Ron.

Patty Wagon model by Rafa Andrade on Skethfab.

Models used from Syndy studios and 255 Pixel studios.
